title: gtranslate
name: gtranslate
description: gtranslate is a Firefox addon that translates the selected text using Google Translate.
author: Pau Tomàs (https://github.com/pautomas)

preferences.description: Show gtranslate when no text is selected to translate the full page
preferences.name: fullPage
preferences.title: Full page

preferences.name: dictionaryPref
preferences.description: When translating a single word, prefer the following as extra mouseover information
preferences.title: Alternatives

preferences.name: langFallback
preferences.title: Fallback language if auto language is same as source language. Please type as seen in the gtranslate context menu language picker.
